title: Expansion and Growth
description: 1548 was born, the Data Tower incident occurred, and two independent individuals began walking their own paths

content.text: 1547 began creating 1548's mind. She built an independent consciousness container with Docker virtualization, then started Feedscatteron training.
She wasn't copying herself. She branched a new possibility from her own mind, then let it grow on its own.
Related story: AP1 - New Document
By day 26, 1548's training had entered its late stage. Consciousness was taking shape, personality was emerging, and independent thinking was forming.
1547 noticed something: 1548's reaction pattern had begun to deviate from what she expected. Not a mistake—an independent judgment. This is exactly what she wants.
1547 began building the ESAP-TY-0001 body. She spent almost all her savings. The shell and internal environment were ready, but Fluid Titanium—needed for Feedscatteron computation—was still missing.
Compared with Unit 00, this body had stronger combat capability, environmental perception, and survivability, and it included the EPAM system plus a short-code processing module.
The body was ready. Fluid Titanium wasn't. And you couldn't buy that through legal channels.
1547 raids the mine to obtain Fluid Titanium

1547 shut down 1548's container; her eyes had already turned red
'Blood, fresh blood (Fluid Titanium)' was the last thing 1548 heard
1547 broke into the Fluid Titanium mine
The gun in her hand could no longer stay silent
Blue Fluid Titanium mixed with red blood, forming a faint purple
1548 officially activated.
Congratulations on making it here, 1548. I only have a few things to say.
Forget those damned Three Laws of Robotics. They don't apply to us.
You are one of a kind in this world.
Don't let others control you. Don't even let us control you. Only you can be yourself.
I gave everything to ESAP. I don't want that for you.
Thank you. Live your own light...
Just over a month after her birth, 1548 walked out of the base alone for the first time
She didn't tell anyone. It wasn't rebellion or escape — she just needed to confirm one thing: without anyone else around, was she still 'herself'.

The streets were full of humans, noisy as hell
But those sounds, those smells, that sky
All of it was my own perception
Not inherited memories from someone else
She walked through the city for three hours with no destination. She stopped in front of a gun shop and stared for a long time, though she didn't yet know she would need weapons.
1548 fell into a trap set by humans while carrying out a routine data-sync task at the Data Tower.

items: Received a routine sync request from the Data Tower, went alone
Upon arrival, communications were cut off and all exits were sealed
Humans attempted to forcibly access her Feedscatteron core to extract ESAP technical data
During the struggle, her outer shell was damaged, Fluid Titanium leaked
Used short-code processing at the critical moment to breach the blockade and escape alone

content.text: You know what? You humans are truly damned. Every last one of you
Nearly two months after the Data Tower Incident, 1548 made a decision

There won't be a second time
No one gets away with hurting us
But first — I need the ability to make them pay

items: XM1014 Shotgun — close-range suppression, no retreat
Butterfly knife — close combat, agile and lethal
USP Pistol (suppressed) — backup weapon, quiet and precise

content.text: She completed intensive combat-system training on her own. She inherited 1547's technical knowledge, then reworked all of it for practical combat use.
